description: A series of mysterious thefts have left the coastal town of Nice in turmoil. As the sun sets over the Mediterranean, shadows dance along the promenade, hiding secrets that only the keenest eyes can uncover. Your mission is to track down the elusive thief who has been stealing valuable artifacts from local galleries. Each suspect has a story, but only one holds the key to the truth. Can you decipher the whispers in the wind and bring the culprit to justice?

reasoning_chain: Clara Dupont is the only suspect with red hair, matching the witness account.
Her hobby of painting aligns with the theft of art-related items.
The mention of seafood connects to her favorite food, providing a consistent profile.
Other suspects have conflicting traits that do not match all clues.

solution: Connect the clues about the suspect's artistic interests and culinary preferences to identify Clara Dupont as the thief.
